item.description:
The 10-Class Pass! Offer Valid through April 1st


If you'd like to practice yoga this spring in a beautiful space with wonderful people and you're SOOO BUSY! here's an opportunity for you!

The practice of Yoga, including Pranayama (yogic breathing) and Meditation can be life-changing! So many times I used to say I can’t go to yoga – I’m just too busy – yet, when I do, I find:


• I feel so great afterwards!
• It is much easier for me to calmly focus and the quality of what I do is much better!
• Although I notice when someone around me is stressed, I don’t get drawn into it because I have a sense of inner calm and when it’s appropriate it is much easier to step in and be helpful, coming from a place of inner calm

I also notice… on a physical level…
• My energy level is higher and more consistent
• And I am much more flexible than I would be if I just continued my regular routine of walking and swimming.

Take time to discover what the practice does for you!

Here’s the spring class schedule:

Vinyasa Flow - 12 classes - Mondays April 1st through June 24th
Mondays - 7 PM – 8:15 (usually go ‘til 8:30 though) at Solstice Healing Arts in Medway
(no class May 27th – Memorial Day)

Here is the Special Offer! A $160 Value for $125!

$125 for the 10-Class Pass
You may take any 10 of the 12 classes offered this Spring. i.e. Ten (10) 1.5 hour classes – April 1st through June 24th
Payment due by 4/1/13 by check $125 or PayPal ($129.00)

To register:
- Bring check to class April 1st OR
- Call Tobi at 508-631-4841 or e-mail tsgold@verizon.net for mailing address OR
- Register on this site.

As always feel free to contact me with any questions. Thank you!

Namaste, Tobi
item.name: Yoga - 10-Class Pass - Sign-up by April 1st
